channel.title: CVE Feed for Android Open Source Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Android Open Source Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-5383|2024-08-05T05:33:44.331Z -- android%20open%20source%20project -- android
item.description: Bluetooth firmware or operating system software drivers in macOS versions before 10.13, High Sierra and iOS versions before 11.4, and Android versions before the 2018-06-05 patch may not sufficiently validate elliptic curve parameters used to generate public keys during a Diffie-Hellman key exchange, which may allow a remote attacker to obtain the encryption key used by the device.
